meanings.sent1: The soppy movie made her cry.
meanings.sent2: She always gets soppy during sad scenes.
meanings.sent3: He teased her for being soppy about cute puppies.
meanings.sent4: Her soppy heart melted at the sight of the old couple holding hands.
meanings.sent5: The soppy love letter was filled with heartfelt words.

meanings.definition: Soaked with liquid; wet and soggy
meanings.sent1: The soppy sponge absorbed all the water.
meanings.sent2: His shoes were soppy after walking in the rain.
meanings.sent3: The soppy towel dripped water all over the floor.
meanings.sent4: The soppy ground squelched under their feet.
meanings.sent5: The soppy cloth clung to her skin after the spill.
